verses.verse: Again the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to me, saying, <S%H559><s%>
Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> cause Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> to know <S%H3045><s%> her abominations, <S%H8441><s%>

And say, <S%H559><s%> Thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%> to Jerusalem; <S%H3389><s%> Your birth <S%H4351><s%> and your nativity <S%H4138><s%> is of the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan; <S%H3667><s%> your father <S%H1><s%> was an Amorite, <S%H567><s%> and your mother <S%H517><s%> an Hittite. <S%H2850><s%>

And as for your nativity, <S%H4138><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> you were born <S%H3205><s%> your navel <S%H8270><s%> was not cut, <S%H3772><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> were you washed <S%H7364><s%> in water <S%H4325><s%> to supple <S%H4935><s%> you; you were not salted <S%H4414><s%> at all, nor <S%H3808><s%> swaddled <S%H2853><s%> at all.

None <S%H3808><s%> eye <S%H5869><s%> pitied <S%H2347><s%> you, to do <S%H6213><s%> any <S%H259><s%> of these <S%H428><s%> to you, to have compassion <S%H2550><s%> on you; but you were cast <S%H7993><s%> out in the open <S%H6440><s%> field, <S%H7704><s%> to the loathing <S%H1604><s%> of your person, <S%H5315><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> that you were born. <S%H3205><s%>

And when I passed <S%H5674><s%> by you, and saw <S%H7200><s%> you polluted <S%H947><s%> in your own blood, <S%H1818><s%> I said <S%H559><s%> to you when you were in your blood, <S%H1818><s%> Live; <S%H2421><s%> yes, I said <S%H559><s%> to you when you were in your blood, <S%H1818><s%> Live. <S%H2421><s%>

I have caused <S%H5414><s%> you to multiply <S%H7233><s%> as the bud <S%H6779><s%> of the field, <S%H7704><s%> and you have increased <S%H7235><s%> and waxen great, <S%H1431><s%> and you are come <S%H935><s%> to excellent <S%H5716><s%> ornaments: <S%H5716><s%> your breasts <S%H7699><s%> are fashioned, <S%H3559><s%> and your hair <S%H8181><s%> is grown, <S%H6779><s%> whereas you were naked <S%H5903><s%> and bore. <S%H6181><s%>

Now when I passed <S%H5674><s%> by you, and looked <S%H7200><s%> on you, behold, <S%H2009><s%> your time <S%H6256><s%> was the time <S%H6256><s%> of love; <S%H1730><s%> and I spread <S%H6566><s%> my skirt <S%H3671><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> you, and covered <S%H3680><s%> your nakedness: <S%H6172><s%> yes, I swore <S%H7650><s%> to you, and entered <S%H935><s%> into a covenant <S%H1285><s%> with you, said <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD, <S%H3069><s%> and you became <S%H1961><s%> mine.
Then washed <S%H7364><s%> I you with water; <S%H4325><s%> yes, I thoroughly washed <S%H7857><s%> away your blood <S%H1818><s%> from you, and I anointed <S%H5480><s%> you with oil. <S%H8081><s%>

I clothed <S%H3847><s%> you also with broidered <S%H7553><s%> work, <S%H7553><s%> and shod <S%H5274><s%> you with badgers' <S%H8476><s%> skin, and I girded <S%H2280><s%> you about with fine linen, <S%H8336><s%> and I covered <S%H3680><s%> you with silk. <S%H4897><s%>

I decked <S%H5710><s%> you also with ornaments, <S%H5716><s%> and I put <S%H5414><s%> bracelets <S%H6781><s%> on your hands, <S%H3027><s%> and a chain <S%H7242><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> your neck. <S%H1627><s%>

And I put <S%H5414><s%> a jewel <S%H5141><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> your forehead, <S%H639><s%> and earrings <S%H5694><s%> in your ears, <S%H241><s%> and a beautiful <S%H8597><s%> crown <S%H5850><s%> on your head. <S%H7218><s%>

Thus were you decked <S%H5710><s%> with gold <S%H2091><s%> and silver; <S%H3701><s%> and your raiment <S%H4403><s%> was of fine linen, <S%H8336><s%> and silk, <S%H4897><s%> and broidered <S%H7553><s%> work; <S%H7553><s%> you did eat <S%H398><s%> fine flour, <S%H5560><s%> and honey, <S%H1706><s%> and oil: <S%H8081><s%> and you were exceeding <S%H3966><s%> beautiful, <S%H3303><s%> and you did prosper <S%H6743><s%> into a kingdom. <S%H4410><s%>

And your renown <S%H8034><s%> went <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> among the heathen <S%H1471><s%> for your beauty: <S%H3308><s%> for it was perfect <S%H3632><s%> through my comeliness, <S%H1926><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I had put <S%H7760><s%> on you, said <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD. <S%H3069><s%>

But you did trust <S%H982><s%> in your own beauty, <S%H3308><s%> and played the harlot <S%H2181><s%> because <S%H5921><s%> of your renown, <S%H8034><s%> and poured <S%H8210><s%> out your fornications <S%H8457><s%> on every <S%H3605><s%> one that passed <S%H5674><s%> by; his it was.

And of your garments <S%H899><s%> you did take, <S%H3947><s%> and decked <S%H6213><s%> your high <S%H1116><s%> places with divers <S%H2921><s%> colors, <S%H2921><s%> and played the harlot <S%H2181><s%> thereupon: the like things shall not come, <S%H935><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shall it be so.

You have also taken <S%H3947><s%> your fair <S%H8597><s%> jewels <S%H3627><s%> of my gold <S%H2091><s%> and of my silver, <S%H3701><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I had given <S%H5414><s%> you, and made <S%H6213><s%> to yourself images <S%H6754><s%> of men, <S%H2145><s%> and did commit <S%H2181><s%> prostitution <S%H2181><s%> with them,

And took <S%H3947><s%> your broidered <S%H7553><s%> garments, <S%H899><s%> and covered them: and you have set <S%H5414><s%> my oil <S%H8081><s%> and my incense <S%H7004><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them.

My meat <S%H3899><s%> also which <S%H834><s%> I gave <S%H5414><s%> you, fine flour, <S%H5560><s%> and oil, <S%H8081><s%> and honey, <S%H1706><s%> with which I fed <S%H398><s%> you, you have even set <S%H5414><s%> it before <S%H6440><s%> them for a sweet <S%H5207><s%> smell: <S%H7381><s%> and thus it was, said <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD. <S%H3069><s%>

Moreover you have taken <S%H3947><s%> your sons <S%H1121><s%> and your daughters, <S%H1323><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> you have borne <S%H3205><s%> to me, and these have you sacrificed <S%H2076><s%> to them to be devoured. <S%H398><s%> Is this of your prostitutions <S%H8457><s%> a small <S%H4592><s%> matter,
That you have slain <S%H7819><s%> my children, <S%H1121><s%> and delivered <S%H5414><s%> them to cause them to pass <S%H5674><s%> through the fire for them?

And in all <S%H3605><s%> your abominations <S%H8441><s%> and your prostitutions <S%H8457><s%> you have not remembered <S%H2142><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of your youth, <S%H5271><s%> when you were <S%H1961><s%> naked <S%H5903><s%> and bore, <S%H6181><s%> and were <S%H1961><s%> polluted <S%H947><s%> in your blood. <S%H1818><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass after <S%H310><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> your wickedness, <S%H7451><s%> (woe, <S%H188><s%> woe <S%H188><s%> to you! said <S%H5002><s%> the LORD <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%>)
That you have also built <S%H1129><s%> to you an eminent <S%H1354><s%> place, and have made <S%H6213><s%> you an high <S%H7413><s%> place in every <S%H3605><s%> street. <S%H7339><s%>

You have built <S%H1129><s%> your high <S%H7413><s%> place at <S%H413><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> head <S%H7218><s%> of the way, <S%H1870><s%> and have made your beauty <S%H3308><s%> to be abhorred, <S%H8581><s%> and have opened <S%H6589><s%> your feet <S%H7272><s%> to every <S%H3605><s%> one that passed <S%H5674><s%> by, and multiplied <S%H7235><s%> your prostitutions. <S%H8457><s%>

You have also committed <S%H2181><s%> fornication <S%H2181><s%> with the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> your neighbors, <S%H7934><s%> great <S%H1432><s%> of flesh; <S%H1320><s%> and have increased <S%H7235><s%> your prostitutions, <S%H8457><s%> to provoke me to anger. <S%H3707><s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> therefore I have stretched <S%H5186><s%> out my hand <S%H3027><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> you, and have diminished <S%H1639><s%> your ordinary <S%H2706><s%> food, and delivered <S%H5414><s%> you to the will <S%H5315><s%> of them that hate <S%H8130><s%> you, the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of the Philistines, <S%H6430><s%> which are ashamed <S%H3637><s%> of your lewd <S%H2154><s%> way. <S%H1870><s%>

You have played the whore <S%H2181><s%> also with the Assyrians, <S%H1121><s%> <S%H804><s%> because <S%H1115><s%> you were insatiable; <S%H1115><s%> <S%H7654><s%> yes, you have played the harlot <S%H2181><s%> with them, and yet could not be satisfied. <S%H7646><s%>

You have moreover multiplied <S%H7235><s%> your fornication <S%H8457><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%> to Chaldea; <S%H3778><s%> and yet <S%H1571><s%> you were not satisfied <S%H7646><s%> therewith. <S%H2063><s%>

How <S%H4100><s%> weak <S%H535><s%> is your heart, <S%H3826><s%> said <S%H5002><s%> the LORD <S%H136><s%> GOD, <S%H3069><s%> seeing you do <S%H6213><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> things, the work <S%H4639><s%> of an imperious <S%H7986><s%> whorish <S%H2181><s%> woman; <S%H802><s%>

In that you build <S%H1129><s%> your eminent <S%H1354><s%> place in the head <S%H7218><s%> of every <S%H3605><s%> way, <S%H1870><s%> and make <S%H6213><s%> your high <S%H7413><s%> place in every <S%H3605><s%> street; <S%H7339><s%> and have not been <S%H1961><s%> as an harlot, <S%H2181><s%> in that you scorn <S%H7046><s%> hire; <S%H868><s%>
But as a wife <S%H802><s%> that commits <S%H5003><s%> adultery, <S%H5003><s%> which takes <S%H3947><s%> strangers <S%H2114><s%> instead <S%H8478><s%> of her husband! <S%H376><s%>

They give <S%H5414><s%> gifts <S%H5078><s%> to all <S%H3605><s%> whores: <S%H2181><s%> but you give <S%H5414><s%> your gifts <S%H5083><s%> to all <S%H3605><s%> your lovers, <S%H157><s%> and hire <S%H7809><s%> them, that they may come <S%H935><s%> to you on every <S%H5437><s%> side <S%H5439><s%> for your prostitution. <S%H8457><s%>

And the contrary <S%H2016><s%> is in you from other women <S%H802><s%> in your prostitutions, <S%H8457><s%> whereas none <S%H3808><s%> follows <S%H310><s%> you to commit <S%H2181><s%> prostitutions: <S%H2181><s%> and in that you give <S%H5414><s%> a reward, <S%H868><s%> and no <S%H3808><s%> reward <S%H868><s%> is given <S%H5414><s%> to you, therefore you are contrary. <S%H2016><s%>
Why, <S%H3651><s%> O harlot, <S%H2181><s%> hear <S%H8085><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD: <S%H3068><s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> Because <S%H3282><s%> your filthiness <S%H5178><s%> was poured <S%H8210><s%> out, and your nakedness <S%H6172><s%> discovered <S%H1540><s%> through your prostitutions <S%H8457><s%> with your lovers, <S%H157><s%> and with all <S%H3605><s%> the idols <S%H1544><s%> of your abominations, <S%H8441><s%> and by the blood <S%H1818><s%> of your children, <S%H1121><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you did give <S%H5414><s%> to them;

Behold, <S%H2005><s%> therefore <S%H3651><s%> I will gather <S%H6908><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> your lovers, <S%H157><s%> with whom <S%H834><s%> you have taken pleasure, <S%H6149><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> them that you have loved, <S%H157><s%> with all <S%H3605><s%> them that you have hated; <S%H8130><s%> I will even gather <S%H6908><s%> them round <S%H5439><s%> about against <S%H5921><s%> you, and will discover <S%H1540><s%> your nakedness <S%H6172><s%> to them, that they may see <S%H7200><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> your nakedness. <S%H6172><s%>

And I will judge <S%H8199><s%> you, as women that break <S%H5003><s%> wedlock <S%H5003><s%> and shed <S%H8210><s%> blood <S%H1818><s%> are judged; <S%H4941><s%> and I will give <S%H5414><s%> you blood <S%H1818><s%> in fury <S%H2534><s%> and jealousy. <S%H7068><s%>

And I will also give <S%H5414><s%> you into their hand, <S%H3027><s%> and they shall throw <S%H2040><s%> down <S%H2040><s%> your eminent <S%H1354><s%> place, and shall break <S%H5422><s%> down <S%H5422><s%> your high <S%H7413><s%> places: they shall strip <S%H6584><s%> you also of your clothes, <S%H899><s%> and shall take <S%H3947><s%> your fair <S%H8597><s%> jewels, <S%H3627><s%> and leave <S%H5117><s%> you naked <S%H5903><s%> and bore. <S%H6181><s%>

They shall also bring <S%H5927><s%> up a company <S%H6951><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> you, and they shall stone <S%H7275><s%> you with stones, <S%H68><s%> and thrust <S%H1333><s%> you through with their swords. <S%H2719><s%>

And they shall burn <S%H8313><s%> your houses <S%H1004><s%> with fire, <S%H784><s%> and execute <S%H6213><s%> judgments <S%H8201><s%> on you in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of many <S%H7227><s%> women: <S%H802><s%> and I will cause you to cease <S%H7673><s%> from playing the harlot, <S%H2181><s%> and you also <S%H1571><s%> shall give <S%H5414><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> hire <S%H868><s%> any more. <S%H5750><s%>

So will I make my fury <S%H2534><s%> toward you to rest, <S%H5117><s%> and my jealousy <S%H7068><s%> shall depart <S%H5493><s%> from you, and I will be quiet, <S%H8252><s%> and will be no <S%H3808><s%> more <S%H5750><s%> angry. <S%H3707><s%>

Because <S%H3282><s%> <S%H834><s%> you have not remembered <S%H2142><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of your youth, <S%H5271><s%> but have fretted <S%H7264><s%> me in all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> things; behold, <S%H1887><s%> therefore I also <S%H1571><s%> will recompense <S%H5414><s%> your way <S%H1870><s%> on your head, <S%H7218><s%> said <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD: <S%H3069><s%> and you shall not commit <S%H6213><s%> this lewdness <S%H2154><s%> above <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> your abominations. <S%H8441><s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> one that uses proverbs <S%H4911><s%> shall use <S%H4911><s%> this proverb <S%H4911><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> you, saying, <S%H559><s%> As is the mother, <S%H517><s%> so is her daughter. <S%H1323><s%>

You are your mother's <S%H517><s%> daughter, <S%H1323><s%> that lothes <S%H1602><s%> her husband <S%H376><s%> and her children; <S%H1121><s%> and you are the sister <S%H269><s%> of your sisters, <S%H269><s%> which <S%H834><s%> loathed <S%H1602><s%> their husbands <S%H582><s%> and their children: <S%H1121><s%> your mother <S%H517><s%> was an Hittite, <S%H2850><s%> and your father <S%H1><s%> an Amorite. <S%H567><s%>

And your elder <S%H1419><s%> sister <S%H269><s%> is Samaria, <S%H8111><s%> she and her daughters <S%H1323><s%> that dwell <S%H3427><s%> at <S%H5921><s%> your left <S%H8040><s%> hand: <S%H8040><s%> and your younger <S%H6996><s%> sister, <S%H269><s%> that dwells <S%H3427><s%> at your right <S%H3225><s%> hand, <S%H3225><s%> is Sodom <S%H5467><s%> and her daughters. <S%H1323><s%>

Yet have you not walked <S%H1980><s%> after their ways, <S%H1870><s%> nor done <S%H6213><s%> after their abominations: <S%H8441><s%> but, as if that were a very <S%H6985><s%> little <S%H4592><s%> thing, you were corrupted <S%H7843><s%> more than they in all <S%H3605><s%> your ways. <S%H1870><s%>

As I live, <S%H2416><s%> said <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD, <S%H3069><s%> Sodom <S%H5467><s%> your sister <S%H269><s%> has not done, <S%H6213><s%> she nor her daughters, <S%H1323><s%> as you have done, <S%H6213><s%> you and your daughters. <S%H1323><s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> was the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of your sister <S%H269><s%> Sodom, <S%H5467><s%> pride, <S%H1347><s%> fullness <S%H7653><s%> of bread, <S%H3899><s%> and abundance <S%H7962><s%> of idleness <S%H8252><s%> was in her and in her daughters, <S%H1323><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> did she strengthen <S%H2388><s%> the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the poor <S%H6041><s%> and needy. <S%H34><s%>
And they were haughty, <S%H1361><s%> and committed <S%H6213><s%> abomination <S%H8441><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me: therefore I took <S%H5493><s%> them away <S%H5493><s%> as I saw <S%H7200><s%> good.

Neither <S%H3808><s%> has Samaria <S%H8111><s%> committed <S%H2398><s%> half <S%H2677><s%> of your sins; <S%H2403><s%> but you have multiplied <S%H7235><s%> your abominations <S%H8441><s%> more than they, and have justified <S%H6663><s%> your sisters <S%H269><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> your abominations <S%H8441><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you have done. <S%H6213><s%>

You also, <S%H1571><s%> which <S%H834><s%> have judged <S%H6419><s%> your sisters, <S%H269><s%> bear <S%H5375><s%> your own shame <S%H3639><s%> for your sins <S%H2403><s%> that you have committed <S%H8581><s%> more abominable <S%H8581><s%> than they: they are more righteous <S%H6663><s%> than you: yes, <S%H1571><s%> be you confounded <S%H954><s%> also, <S%H1571><s%> and bear <S%H5375><s%> your shame, <S%H3639><s%> in that you have justified <S%H6663><s%> your sisters. <S%H269><s%>

When I shall bring <S%H7725><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> their captivity, <S%H7622><s%> the captivity <S%H7622><s%> of Sodom <S%H5467><s%> and her daughters, <S%H1323><s%> and the captivity <S%H7622><s%> of Samaria <S%H8111><s%> and her daughters, <S%H1323><s%> then will I bring again the captivity <S%H7622><s%> of your captives <S%H7628><s%> in the middle <S%H8432><s%> of them:

That you may bear <S%H5375><s%> your own shame, <S%H3639><s%> and may be confounded <S%H3637><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> that you have done, <S%H6213><s%> in that you are a comfort <S%H5162><s%> to them.
